releases.name: OESE SharePoint Sites
releases.description: The OESE SharePoint Project provides a centralized knowledge management system and portal to improve internal communication within OESE, provides OESE staff access to the right information when they need it, and enables collaboration among OESE staff.  The OESE SharePoint portal contains an organized, centralized and searchable repository of OESE-specific information that is not currently available elsewhere.  Items currently available on-line include leading indicators, OESE�s logic model toolkit, performance data, process maps, and information on internal OESE processes (e.g., standard operating procedures, templates, checklists, examples, best practices).

permissions.exemptionText: Custom code for this project was created release prior to 08082016

releases.name: Migrant Student Information Exchange (MSIX)
releases.description: The Migrant Student Information Exchange (MSIX) is the technology that allows States to share educational and health information on migrant children who travel from State to State and who as a result, have student records in multiple States' information systems.
